alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 04 at 3:00AM EDT until June 05 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.1 to 3.6 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Dukes MA County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 2 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of low-lying shore roads. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/12 PM 2.1/ 2.6 0.1/ 0.6 0.5/ 1.0 3 None 05/01 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.8/ 1.3 0.8/ 1.3 3 None 05/01 PM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.7 0.6/ 1.1 3 None 06/02 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.7/ 1.1 0.7/ 1.1 1 None 06/02 PM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.8 0.6/ 1.1 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
